mutants.code:
def calculate_max_path_length(v1: int, v2: int, t: int, d: int) -> int:
    ans = v1 - v2
    a1 = []
    a2 = []
    t1 = v1
    t2 = v2
    for i in range(t - 2):
        t1 += d
        t2 += d
        a1.append(t1)
        a2.append(t2)
    a2.reverse()
    for i in range(t - 2):
        ans += min(a1[i], a2[i])
    return ans

    ans = v1 * v2
